com.compendium.core.db
Class DBViewLink

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.core.db.DBViewLink

public class DBViewLink
extends java.lang.Object

The DBViewLink class serves as the interface layer to the ViewLink table in the database for the relationship between Views and Links in the datamodel.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String DELETE_VIEW_QUERY
          SQL statement to set the status as deleted on records in the ViewLink table for the given ViewID.
static java.lang.String DELETE_VIEWLINK_QUERY
          SQL statement to set the status as deleted on a record in the ViewLink table for the given ViewID and LinkID.
static java.lang.String GET_ACTIVEVIEWSCOUNT_QUERY
          SQL statement to return a count of the ViewIDs for the given LinkID, if active.
static java.lang.String GET_VIEWLINK_QUERY
          SQL statement to return the record for the given ViewID and LinkID if the Status is active.

static java.lang.String GET_VIEWS_QUERY

          SQL statement to insert a new View/Link relationship into the ViewLink table.

          SQL statement to set the purge the records in the ViewLink table for the given ViewID and LinkID.
static java.lang.String RESTORE_VIEW_QUERY
          SQL statement to set the status as active on records in the ViewLink table for the given ViewID.
static java.lang.String RESTORE_VIEWLINK_QUERY
          SQL statement to set the status as active on a record in the ViewLink table for the given ViewID and LinkID.

                             java.lang.String sViewID,

Inserts a new viewlink record in the database.

Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
sViewID, - the id of the view the link is in.
sLinkID, - the id of the link in the given view.
Returns:
boolean, true if it was successful, else false.

java.sql.SQLException

recreate

public static boolean recreate(DBConnection dbcon,
                               java.lang.String sViewID,
                               java.lang.String sLinkID,
                               java.util.Date dCreationDate,
                               java.util.Date dModificationDate,
                               int nCurrentStatus)
                        throws java.sql.SQLException
Inserts a new viewlink record in the database. Used specifically by the DBUpdateDatabase class to restore links it has deleted.

Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
sViewID, - the id of the view the link is in.
sLinkID, - the id of the link in the given view.
dCreationDate, - the creation date for this ViewLink record.
dModificationDate, - the modificationDate for this ViewLink record.
nStatus, - the status of this ViewLink.
Returns:
boolean, true if it was successful, else false.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
